#labels Phase-Implementation
GEWebBrowser   

= Introduction =

The main control that holds the Google Earth Plugin 


= Details =

The GEWebBrowser inherits from the standard System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser control 

= Constructor = 

GEWebBrowser() - _Initializes a new instance of the GEWebBrowser class._

= Public events =

_GEWebBorwserEventHandeler_ *KmlLoaded* - _Raised when the plugin is ready_

_GEWebBorwserEventHandeler_ *PluginReady* - _Raised when a kml/kmz file has loaded_

_GEWebBorwserEventHandeler_ *ScriptError* - _Raised when there is a script error in the document_

= Public methods = 

_void_ *Ready*(IGEPlugin plugin) - _
This method should be called from javascript when the plugin is ready. Ideally this would be done in the "google.earth.createInstance" callback function.<br>i.e. window.external.Ready(ge);_

_void_ *LoadKml*(string url) - _Loads a kml/kmz file specified by the url._

_void_ *LoadKmlCallBack*(IKmlFeature kmlFeature) - _This method should be called from javascript when a kml or kmz file has been successfully loaded. Ideally this is done in the "google.earth.fetchKml" callback function.<br>
i.e. window.external.LoadKmlCallBack(kmlFeature);_

_object_ *CreatePlacemark*(string id, string name, double lat, double lng, string description) - _Create a placemark and add it to the plugin_

_object_ *CreatLookAt*(double lat, double lng, double alt, double range, int mode) - _Create a KmlLookAt object_

_void_ *CreateHtmlStringBalloon*(string text) - _Create and display a Html String Balloon object in the plugin_

_void_ *InjectJavascript*(string javascript) - _Injects a javascript element into the document head_

_object_ *InvokeJavascript*(string function) - _Executes a script function defined in the currently loaded document._

_object_ *InvokeJavascript*(string function, object[] args) - _Executes a script function defined in the currently loaded document using the supplied arguments_

_void_ *ModifyCss*(string elementId, string css, bool overwrite) - _Ammend or overwrite the css style of a DOM element_
